item.title: 电动卡车是对中国石油需求的最新威胁
item.description: 越来越多的中国卡车采用电池驱动，这也表明，在日益电气化的经济中，石油燃料正被挤到一边。【原文：More and more Chinese trucks are being powered by batteries, another sign that oil-based fuels are getting shoved to the sidelines in an increasingly electrified economy.】

item.title: 贸易担忧引发避险情绪，黄金延续强劲涨势
item.description: 由于美元走软以及贸易和地缘政治风险导致的避险需求增强，黄金在创下四周来最大单日涨幅后走高。【原文：Gold edged higher following its biggest daily jump in four weeks on a weaker dollar and stronger demand for havens due to trade and geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 美元走软、地缘政治不确定性加剧，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于美元走软提升了以美元计价的大宗商品的吸引力，而地缘政治的动荡限制了俄罗斯和伊朗增加供应的机会，石油连续第二天上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a second day as a weakening dollar boosted the appeal of commodities priced in the currency and geopolitical ructions limited the chance of more supply from Russia and Iran.】

item.title: 巴西寻求石油业提供 62 亿美元以支撑财政
item.description: 巴西能源部提议采取措施，在未来两年内从石油行业筹集约 350 亿雷亚尔（62 亿美元）的资金，以帮助政府实现财政目标。【原文：Brazil’s energy ministry has proposed measures to raise around 35 billion reais ($6.2 billion) from the oil industry over the next two years to help the government meet its fiscal targets.】

item.title: 印度证券交易所衍生品市场争夺战白热化
item.description: 印度主要证券交易所之间的竞争已进入高风险阶段，它们正在争夺对衍生品市场的控制权，这可能会对从交易量到流动性流动等各个方面产生影响。【原文：A rivalry between India’s major stock exchanges has entered a high-stakes phase, as they wrestle for control over the derivatives market in potential implications for everything from trading volumes to liquidity flows.】

item.title: 前官员称日本央行可能在明年结束债券购买计划
item.description: 据一位前日本央行董事会成员称，日本央行可能会在本月举行的一次会议上决定在下一财年的计划中停止削减国债购买量，因为他们看到日本国债收益率飙升令人担忧。【原文：The Bank of Japan will probably decide to stop reducing the amount of its government bond purchases in a plan for next fiscal year when authorities gather this month, as they eye a worrisome surge in JGB yields, according to a former BOJ board member.】

item.title: 美国科技股反弹后，亚洲股市将迎来提振：市场综述
item.description: 在大型科技股反弹带动美国股市走高之后，亚洲股市开盘将迎来利好。美元触及 2023 年以来最低点，债券下跌。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a positive open after a rebound in big tech drove US stocks higher. Bonds fell as the dollar hit its lowest since 2023.】

item.title: 对多变的特朗普而言，与中国和欧洲的贸易协定难以实现
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普迫切希望达成更多贸易协议，但与中国和欧洲的谈判在沟通中断和新的关税威胁中继续徘徊不前。【原文：US President Donald Trump is eager to land more trade deals, but talks with China and Europe continue to languish amid communications breakdowns and fresh tariff threats.】

item.title: 微软上月裁员 6000 人后再裁员数百人
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）在数年来最大规模裁员后仅几周又裁减了数百个职位，这凸显了科技行业在向人工智能投入数十亿美元的同时仍在努力削减成本。【原文：Microsoft Corp. cut hundreds more jobs just weeks after its largest layoff in years, underscoring the tech industry’s efforts to trim costs even as it plows billions of dollars into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 派拉蒙任命新董事会成员，包括前法官和律师
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）提名了三名新的董事会成员，另有一名成员卸任，使董事会成员总数达到七名，这家媒体和娱乐公司正面临着来自美国总统的诉讼，并在寻求合并批准。【原文：Paramount Global nominated three new members to its board of directors and one stepped down, bringing the total to seven as the media and entertainment company faces a lawsuit from the US president and seeks merger approval.】

item.title: EchoStar 债券困境加剧，因为 Dish Network 未支付利息
item.description: 亿万富翁查理-厄根（Charlie Ergen）控制的无线和付费电视运营商 EchoStar 公司继上周末采取类似行动后，决定不支付三笔债券的利息。【原文：EchoStar Corp., the wireless and pay-TV operator controlled by billionaire Charlie Ergen, has decided to skip interest payments on three bonds after a similar act late last week.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒战略公司发行 2.5 亿美元优先股
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）领导的战略公司正计划上市一种新型永久优先股，以筹集更多资金购买比特币。【原文：Strategy is planning to list a new type of perpetual preferred stock, as the company led by Michael Saylor seeks to raise more funds to buy Bitcoin.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的国内障碍正在重塑中东金融秩序
item.description:
银行家和商界领袖正将更多的注意力转移到沙特王国在海湾地区的邻国，因为沙特王国正努力应对油价下跌和财政疲软的问题。【原文：

Bankers and business leaders are shifting more attention toward the kingdom’s neighbors in the Gulf as it grapples with lower oil prices and weakening finances.

】

item.title: 韩国投票选举新领导人，以挽救国家、恢复增长
item.description: 在去年年底试图实施戒严引发数十年来最严重的宪政危机之后，韩国民众周二将前往投票站选举新总统来领导国家。【原文：South Koreans head to the polls Tuesday to elect a new president to lead the nation after an attempt to impose martial law at the end of last year triggered its worst constitutional crisis in decades.】

item.title: Uber 提升公司资深员工为首席运营官，首席执行官称他不会 "离开 "公司
item.description: 优步科技公司任命长期高管安德鲁-麦克唐纳（Andrew Macdonald）为2019年以来的首位首席运营官，这是该公司高管调整的一部分，其中包括该公司最高交付负责人的离职。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. named longtime executive Andrew Macdonald as its first chief operating officer since 2019, part of an executive shake-up that includes the departure of the company’s top delivery leader.】

item.title: 美国国债回落提振亚洲评级最高的债券
item.description: 澳大利亚和新加坡的国债因人们对国债吸引力的质疑不断升温而受到提振，因为在最近评级下调之后，人们担心拟议中的美国税收法案可能会打击外国投资者，这又增加了压力。【原文：Bonds in Australia and Singapore are getting a lift from rising questions about the appeal of Treasuries, as fears that a proposed US tax bill may hit foreign investors add to pressure following a recent ratings downgrade.】

item.title: 软件仍是美国 IPO 反弹的缺失要素
item.description: 五月份一连串科技公司的成功亮相再次点燃了人们的乐观情绪，曾经盛极一时的企业软件行业不久将重新成为美国交易组合中的重要贡献者。【原文：May’s string of successful technology company debuts is reigniting optimism that the once-prolific enterprise software sector will soon resurface as a significant contributor to the US deal mix.】

item.title: 激进分子布朗宁-韦斯特与新任首席执行官布罗姆伯格带领 CAE 重新出发
item.description: 投资公司 Browning West LP 称，在新任首席执行官的领导下，飞行模拟器公司 CAE Inc.【原文：Investment firm Browning West LP says flight simulator company CAE Inc. should be able to double its profit over the next three to four years under the direction of a new chief executive officer.】

item.title: Clearlake 债务重组，为 Quest 软件获得新资金
item.description: Clearlake 资本集团支持的 Quest 软件公司将获得 3.5 亿美元的新资金，用于资助其人工智能和发展计划。【原文：A deal to provide Clearlake Capital Group-backed Quest Software Inc. with $350 million of fresh capital to help fund its artificial intelligence and growth plans is coming at the expense of some lenders who will be pushed down the repayment line.】

item.title: 加纳宣布再次通缉前财政部长奥福里-阿塔
item.description: 加纳特别检察官宣布再次通缉前财政部长肯-奥福里-阿塔（Ken Ofori-Atta），因为他错过了周一就其任期内项目付款问题接受质询的最后期限。【原文：Ghana’s special prosecutor has declared former Minister of Finance Ken Ofori-Atta wanted again after he missed a deadline Monday to appear for questioning about payments for projects during his tenure.】

item.title: Grindr 突然复职是 "破坏工会"，美国劳资关系委员会律师告诉法官
item.description: 美国劳工部检察官告诉该机构的一名法官，Grindr 公司 "突然 "改变了远程办公政策，要求员工返回办公室，以报复工会运动。【原文：Grindr Inc. changed its remote-work policy “out of the blue,” demanding employees return to the office in retaliation for a union drive after previously telling them they could keep teleworking, US labor board prosecutors told an agency judge.】

item.title: 加拿大总理就新管道、港口和矿山向卡尼抛出橄榄枝
item.description: 在周一举行的一次会议上，加拿大各省领导人敦促总理马克-卡尼支持新的石油管道、电网、重要矿产、港口和铁路项目，以确定应快速推进的 "国家建设 "项目。【原文：Canada’s provincial leaders urged Prime Minister Mark Carney to back new oil pipelines, electricity grids, critical mineral mines, ports and railways at a meeting on Monday meant to identify “nation-building” projects to be fast-tracked.】

item.title: 高级副总裁与贷款人就延长 Kloeckner 高级债务进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Strategic Value Partners 公司和 Kloeckner Pentaplast 公司的一批债权人正在就延长这家德国包装公司优先债务到期日至明年以后的问题进行深入谈判，因为通货膨胀和需求减弱给该公司的业务带来了压力。【原文：Strategic Value Partners and a group of creditors of Kloeckner Pentaplast are in advanced talks to extend the maturity of the German packaging company’s senior debt beyond next year as inflation and waning demand pressure its business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 塔斯社称，俄罗斯向乌克兰提出的建议寻求天然气过境回归
item.description: 据国营塔斯社援引俄罗斯提交给乌克兰的一份备忘录报道，该备忘录设想逐步恢复外交和经济关系，包括天然气过境。【原文：A Russian memorandum presented to Ukraine envisions the gradual restoration of diplomatic and economic ties, including with regard to natural-gas transit, the state-run Tass news service reported, citing the document.】

item.title: 最高法院征求司法部对赫兹债券持有人案件的意见
item.description: 最高法院邀请司法部就赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：The Supreme Court invited a brief from the Justice Department for advice on a Hertz Global Holdings Inc. case about a roughly $320 million payment that the rental car firm may owe to bondholders.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩称官员需考虑债券销售的影响
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，官员们在决定利率政策时需要考虑量化紧缩政策可能对长期债券收益率和经济产生的影响。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann said that officials need to consider the impact quantitative tightening may be having on long-dated bond yields and the economy when deciding interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 通过摩根士丹利启动 50 亿美元债务出售计划
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利正在为埃隆-马斯克的人工智能公司 xAI Corp.【原文：Morgan Stanley is shopping a $5 billion debt package for Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company, xAI Corp., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 米莱的外汇交易策略引发 2019 年以来最强劲的美元需求
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统几乎取消了这个危机频发的南美国家的外汇限制之后，阿根廷的美元需求创下了 2019 年以来的新高。【原文：Demand for dollars in Argentina hit its highest since 2019 after President Javier Milei all but eliminated foreign-exchange restrictions in the crisis-prone South American nation.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比表示，如果贸易政策得到解决，利率可能下降
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）重申，美国经济表面看来良好，如果贸易政策的不确定性得到解决，央行可以继续降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee reiterated the US economy looks good underneath the surface, and the central bank can proceed with interest-rate cuts if uncertainty around trade policy is resolved.】

item.title: 刚果铜矿洪水最新消息公布后艾芬豪股价大涨
item.description: 艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）股价大涨，此前这家加拿大公司表示正在推进重新开放刚果民主共和国境内一座巨型铜矿部分矿区的工作，但尚未承诺重启日期。【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. shares jumped after the Canadian company said it’s advancing work on reopening parts of a giant copper mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo, without yet committing to a restart date.】
